channel.title: SBot
channel.description: Ok well well i said i would so this a while ago and never but this whole idea is to make private server bot. the reason im doing this is so i can get the grips of BCEL and reflection and for learning purposes. The one problem i am have running is what do people want on a private server bot. do you want a scriptable bot like rs bot and Aryan or what?. I just need to no what people who play private servers want.

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:8, topic:307479”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=403635.msg2988930#msg2988930 date=1255191569]
An Aryan bot would be awesome, shame Moparisthebest removed the Aryan scripts section.
[/quote]

The sections are still there, they were just so inactive that they were forgotten.[/quote]

So they are hidden from normal members of the community? so people with special ranks could look at them? Cm, Vet, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

It just for learning purposes tbh because i don’t play private servers anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

spank:

Ok well i have started, Moparisthebest i was planning on using BCEL to load the client but there was no point of it.

You have the entire source, and BCEL wouldn’t help you load it anyway, reflection would.

Again though, MoparScape is an Aryan bot, so why reinvent the wheel?

Read full topic

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

First, you wouldn’t use BCEL or reflection for a private server bot.

Secondly, isn’t Aryan (the bot) built into MoparScape? You can write your own scripts and do whatever you want with that, right?

Read full topic

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Ok well im mearly brain storming the idea atm.

Read full topic

item.title: SBot
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Please make it a scriptable bot- Not for our benifit, but for the benifit of yourself to prevent idiots trying to leech your source and add things which are way to complicated for themselves.

With a scriptable bot you can simplify things so anyone can create something for the bot, so in the end you get your experience and people wont moan like bitches that they cant “code”.

Nice to see you making some rsps development spank <3

Read full topic
